name: jatmn_stone_ammo
author: JATMN
title: Cheap Stone Ammo
description:
Cheap Stone Ammo...? - Now with Settings!
This Ammo was created for world/mods that have limited starting resources and making traditional Ammo is an issue.

Ammo is purely made of stone ore. Does very very limited damage, but does a little knockback.. because why not its stone right?
